Question: I often feel sad or hopeless.
I have lost interest or pleasure in activities that I used to enjoy.
I struggle to concentrate or make decisions.
I experience changes in appetite or weight (significant increase or decrease).
I have trouble sleeping (insomnia) or I sleep excessively (hypersomnia).
I often feel fatigued or have a lack of energy.
